ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: DDD worthless?  How would you change it?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... it would take you maybe 20 seconds to mem this song.  if you start the memorization as soon as you get the cantana message, you have 12 free seconds to mem
ygData.messageBody:
>In most conditions, we're pulling too fast for me to take the time to mem and demem this, and keep track
>of what song I don't have available in the meantime. Nobody likes me to stop singing Cantana in downtime,
>I'd better have a really good reason. And while I haven't worked out the math, I bet the net mana gain
>from my singing the extra few pulses of Cantana on 3 casters can be used for comparable effect on the
>MOB(s) regardless. So why give myself the headache?

it would take you maybe 20 seconds to mem this song. if you start the memorization as soon as you get
the cantana message, you have 12 free seconds to mem while the song is still active, then it'll cost you
11 seconds (8 more to mem, plus 3 more to restart cantana) i doubt you restore enough mana in 2 pulses
of cantana to get close to 435 damage.
